title: This Is The Besta
lyrics:
[Intro]
I'm going to Mexico to fiesta
I'm going to Mexico to fiesta
I'm going to Mexico to fiesta
Uno, dos, tres
This is the best-(ahh)

I'm going to Mexico to fiesta
I'm going to Mexico to fiesta
I'm going to Mexico to fiesta
Uno, dos, tres
This is the best-(ahh)
I'm going to Mexico to fiesta (fiesta)
I'm going to Mexico to fiesta (fiesta)
I'm going to Mexico to fiesta (fiesta)
Uno, dos, tres
This is the best-(ahh)
Uno, dos, tres
This is the best-(ahh)
[Outro]
Te quiero mucho Mexico
